other possibility.

expects it!

able to get past it herself.

Well, those are claw marks, but I don't think they
came from a monster.

jpnSearchText:
この破壊痕……魔獣ではなく、
流星鞭と爪の攻撃みたいです。

engSearchText:
Nah, that lady is one HELL of a monster.
She could've hopped over it, but instead, she razed
that shit to the ground with her bare hands.

jpnSearchText:
クク、素直に飛び越えりゃいいものを
わざわざブチ壊したってわけか。

engSearchText:
I think she used a whip, too, but that's beside
the point. She probably just needed to unload
some stress.

jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……相当ストレスが
溜まっていそうな感じだな。

Well, at least we now know she's gone down to
the waterfall. Progress!

jpnSearchText:
あはは……でもこの様子だと
問題なく滝には行けてそうですね。

engChrName: Anyway, let's go find her. The sooner we ease our client's worries, the better.
engSearchText:
Anyway, let's go find her. The sooner we ease our
client's worries, the better.

jpnSearchText:
あの男の子も心配していますし
改めて迎えに行きましょうか。

engChrName: Indeed. Let's head that way now. The sooner we find her, the sooner we ease our client's worries.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Let's head that way now. The sooner we find
her, the sooner we ease our client's worries.

jpnSearchText:
ええ、依頼人も心配されていますし、
改めてお迎えにあがりましょうか。

engSearchText:
Very likely. In any event, I think we can safely
conclude she has made her way to the waterfall.

find her, the sooner we ease our client's worries.

なかなか見事じゃない。

ッ……

ふう……
焦らせるんじゃねえっての。

capital and—

today...is kicking your ass, you stupid primate!

divine retribution. So get ready—because it's curtains
for you!

engChrName: (Damn. That little brat can be terrifying when she wants to be.)
engSearchText:
(Damn. That little brat can be terrifying when she
wants to be.)
jpnChrName: （コイツはコイツで   末恐ろしいガキだな……）
jpnSearchText:
（コイツはコイツで
末恐ろしいガキだな……）

engChrName: Now, then. Shall we return to Longlai?
engSearchText: Now, then. Shall we return to Longlai?
jpnChrName: ふふ、それではわたくし達も 龍來に戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それではわたくし達も
龍來に戻りましょうか。

engChrName: Yes. We shouldn't keep Yumé and Quatre waiting any longer.
engSearchText:
Yes. We shouldn't keep Yumé and Quatre waiting
any longer.
jpnChrName: そうですね……ユメちゃんに カトル君も待っていますし。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……ユメちゃんに
カトル君も待っていますし。

engChrName: Yes. We best not keep Agnès and Yumé waiting.
engSearchText: Yes. We best not keep Agnès and Yumé waiting.
jpnChrName: そうだね、アニエスさんに ユメちゃんも待ってるだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
そうだね、アニエスさんに
ユメちゃんも待ってるだろうし。

engChrName: Now that that's settled, we should make our way back to Longlai.
engSearchText:
Now that that's settled, we should make our way back
to Longlai.
jpnChrName: はは、それじゃあ 僕たちも龍來に戻ろうか。
jpnSearchText:
はは、それじゃあ
僕たちも龍來に戻ろうか。

engChrName: Good idea. We shouldn't keep Yumé and Risette waiting any longer.
engSearchText:
Good idea. We shouldn't keep Yumé and Risette
waiting any longer.
jpnChrName: そうですね……ユメちゃんに リゼットさんも待っていますし。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……ユメちゃんに
リゼットさんも待っていますし。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: ジュディスからの謝礼としてミラが振り込まれた。
jpnSearchText: ジュディスからの謝礼として<C2><C0>ミラが振り込まれた。

engChrName: Don't sense any monsters around here. That's...weird. It's not like they're uniquely active during the day or anything.
engSearchText:
Don't sense any monsters around here. That's...weird.
It's not like they're uniquely active during the day
or anything.
jpnChrName: 妙だな……魔獣の気配が無さ過ぎる。 ここの魔獣は別に昼行性でもねぇと思うが……
jpnSearchText:
妙だな……魔獣の気配が無さ過ぎる。
ここの魔獣は別に昼行性でもねぇと思うが……

engChrName: If that novice took care of 'em all, he did one hell of a job.
engSearchText:
If that novice took care of 'em all, he did one hell of
a job.
jpnChrName: ……これを全部、あの駆け出しが 片付けたんだとすりゃあ大したもんだが。
jpnSearchText:
……これを全部、あの駆け出しが
片付けたんだとすりゃあ大したもんだが。

engChrName: Probably means the guy's out of gas by now, though.
engSearchText: Probably means the guy's out of gas by now, though.
jpnChrName: 一人でこれだけ戦ったとなると、 消耗も相当なもんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
一人でこれだけ戦ったとなると、
消耗も相当なもんだろう。

engChrName: I guess everyone's gotta blow off some steam every now and then...
engSearchText:
I guess everyone's gotta blow off some steam every
now and then...
jpnChrName: 相応の理由があるのは間違いなさそうだが……
jpnSearchText: 相応の理由があるのは間違いなさそうだが……

engChrName: ...but if he keeps goin' full throttle, he'll find himself in the thick of trouble sooner or later. I should follow him just in case.
engSearchText:
...but if he keeps goin' full throttle, he'll find himself
in the thick of trouble sooner or later. I should follow
him just in case.
jpnChrName: 消耗した状態で進んだとなりゃあ ちょいとばかりリスクが高い、追う他無さそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
消耗した状態で進んだとなりゃあ
ちょいとばかりリスクが高い、追う他無さそうだな。

engChrName: Oho. Finally come out to play, have we?
engSearchText: Oho. Finally come out to play, have we?
jpnChrName: ハッ、ようやくお出迎えか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ようやくお出迎えか。

engChrName: Figured he'd miss a few.
engSearchText: Figured he'd miss a few.
jpnChrName: 流石に一匹残らず狩り尽くされたとは 思っちゃいなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
流石に一匹残らず狩り尽くされたとは
思っちゃいなかったが……

engChrName: ...Okay, he missed more than a few. Great.
engSearchText: ...Okay, he missed more than a few. Great.
jpnChrName: おいおい、こんなに寄ってくるとは…… 俺を仲間の仇とでも思ってやがるのか？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、こんなに寄ってくるとは……
俺を仲間の仇とでも思ってやがるのか？

engChrName: The odds are gettin' stacked against me, but I can turn the tables on these dung-for-brains with my shar—
engSearchText:
The odds are gettin' stacked against me, but I can
turn the tables on these dung-for-brains with my
shar—
jpnChrName: ……しゃあねぇ、分は悪いが シャードを使って上手い事──
jpnSearchText:
……しゃあねぇ、分は悪いが
シャードを使って上手い事──

engChrName: ...Never mind, I guess.
engSearchText: ...Never mind, I guess.
jpnChrName: ……今のは！
jpnSearchText: ……今のは！

engChrName: Close call. You all right there? Wait, are you...?
engSearchText: Close call. You all right there? Wait, are you...?
jpnChrName: 間一髪だったな、大丈夫か？ ……ってありゃ、あんたは……
jpnSearchText:
間一髪だったな、大丈夫か？
……ってありゃ、あんたは……

engChrName: Ah, you're a spriggan, yeah? I heard about you from Drusilla.
engSearchText:
Ah, you're a spriggan, yeah? I heard about you
from Drusilla.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋だったか……あんたの事は ドルシラさんから聞いているぜ。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋だったか……あんたの事は
ドルシラさんから聞いているぜ。

engChrName: And you're Kazan from the Longlai branch, yeah?
engSearchText: And you're Kazan from the Longlai branch, yeah?
jpnChrName: 龍來支部の……確かカザンだったか。
jpnSearchText: 龍來支部の……確かカザンだったか。

engChrName: You searchin' for that newbie, too? I'm thinking he's just up ahead.
engSearchText:
You searchin' for that newbie, too? I'm thinking he's
just up ahead.
jpnChrName: あんたが探してんのはあの新米か？ 多分、あいつならこの先だと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あんたが探してんのはあの新米か？
多分、あいつならこの先だと思うぜ。

engChrName: I had the same thought. Great minds think alike, I suppose.
engSearchText:
I had the same thought. Great minds think alike,
I suppose.
jpnChrName: ……睨んだ通りって事か。 てか、アンタも探してくれてたのか？
jpnSearchText:
……睨んだ通りって事か。
てか、アンタも探してくれてたのか？

engChrName: Well, since we're doing the same job, why don't we join up? We could share some intel while we're at it.
engSearchText:
Well, since we're doing the same job, why don't we
join up? We could share some intel while we're at it.
jpnChrName: 正直、このまま手伝ってくれると めちゃくちゃ助かるんだけどなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
正直、このまま手伝ってくれると
めちゃくちゃ助かるんだけどなぁ？

engChrName: Sure. Two heads are better than one.
engSearchText: Sure. Two heads are better than one.
jpnChrName: ま、乗りかかった舟でもあるしな。
jpnSearchText: ま、乗りかかった舟でもあるしな。

engChrName: My help doesn't come free, though. So long as that's not a problem, then I'll gladly lend a hand.
engSearchText:
My help doesn't come free, though. So long as that's
not a problem, then I'll gladly lend a hand.
jpnChrName: 依頼料はきっちりいただくが、 それでも構わないんなら手伝うぜ？
jpnSearchText:
依頼料はきっちりいただくが、
それでも構わないんなら手伝うぜ？

engChrName: Well, I suppose you can't make an omelet without breaking a few eggs.
engSearchText:
Well, I suppose you can't make an omelet without
breaking a few eggs.
jpnChrName: ま、背に腹は代えられないしな。
jpnSearchText: ま、背に腹は代えられないしな。

engChrName: In that case, I'll tell you everything I know.
engSearchText: In that case, I'll tell you everything I know.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ頼む手前だ。 一応、事情は話しておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあ頼む手前だ。
一応、事情は話しておくぜ。

engChrName: Kazan explained that Gray was training at the Longlai branch to acquire his letter of recommendation.
engSearchText:
Kazan explained that Gray was training at the
Longlai branch to acquire his letter
of recommendation.
jpnChrName: カザンは、グレイが推薦状取得のために 龍來支部で修行中である事を語った。
jpnSearchText:
カザンは、グレイが推薦状取得のために
龍來支部で修行中である事を語った。

engChrName: He was serious, yet cordial. Everyone who came to the guild with requests held him in high regard.
engSearchText:
He was serious, yet cordial. Everyone who came to
the guild with requests held him in high regard.
jpnChrName: グレイは真面目で人当たりが良く、 龍來の依頼者からも好感を持たれていたという。
jpnSearchText:
グレイは真面目で人当たりが良く、
龍來の依頼者からも好感を持たれていたという。

engChrName: However...
engSearchText: However...
jpnChrName: しかし──
jpnSearchText: しかし──

engChrName: I trained with him quite a bit, and every time we fought, his thirst for power was...abnormally palpable.
engSearchText:
I trained with him quite a bit, and every time we
fought, his thirst for power was...abnormally palpable.
jpnChrName: 何度か戦闘訓練には付き合ったんだが、 あいつ……“力”への渇望が尋常じゃないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
何度か戦闘訓練には付き合ったんだが、
あいつ……“力”への渇望が尋常じゃないんだ。

engChrName: He's got some major tunnel vision when it comes to combat.
engSearchText:
He's got some major tunnel vision when it comes
to combat.
jpnChrName: 普段は真面目な癖して、 戦いになると周りが見えなくなるっつーか……
jpnSearchText:
普段は真面目な癖して、
戦いになると周りが見えなくなるっつーか……

engChrName: While that quality has helped him get stronger, it's never enough for him. He says he will stop at nothing to get more power.
engSearchText:
While that quality has helped him get stronger, it's
never enough for him. He says he will stop at nothing
to get more power.
jpnChrName: 強くなるためなら何でもする── そういう類の危うさがあるんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
強くなるためなら何でもする──
そういう類の危うさがあるんだよな。

engChrName: You met Gray in the capital, right? You happen to hear anything about his situation?
engSearchText:
You met Gray in the capital, right? You happen to
hear anything about his situation?
jpnChrName: あんたは首都でもグレイと会ってんだろ？ 何か事情を聞いてたりしないか？
jpnSearchText:
あんたは首都でもグレイと会ってんだろ？
何か事情を聞いてたりしないか？

engChrName: Nope. I've got nothing.
engSearchText: Nope. I've got nothing.
jpnChrName: ……悪いがそこのところは俺も知らねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ……悪いがそこのところは俺も知らねぇな。

engChrName: Doesn't seem like he's really opened up to the folks in the capital, either.
engSearchText:
Doesn't seem like he's really opened up to the folks in
the capital, either.
jpnChrName: 恐らくだが……総支部の連中にも 身の上話はしていないように見えるしな。
jpnSearchText:
恐らくだが……総支部の連中にも
身の上話はしていないように見えるしな。

engChrName: I guess we'll just have to ask him about what's going on when we find him.
engSearchText:
I guess we'll just have to ask him about what's going
on when we find him.
jpnChrName: となると、直接問いただす他ねぇか……
jpnSearchText: となると、直接問いただす他ねぇか……

engChrName: All right. We're running short on time, so let's track him down quick.
engSearchText:
All right. We're running short on time, so let's track
him down quick.
jpnChrName: よし、そうとなれば時間が惜しい。 とっとと先を急ぐとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よし、そうとなれば時間が惜しい。
とっとと先を急ぐとしようぜ。

engChrName: Easy as pie.
engSearchText: Easy as pie.
jpnChrName: ま、こんなところか……
jpnSearchText: ま、こんなところか……

engChrName: Hah. They didn't even stand a chance.
engSearchText: Hah. They didn't even stand a chance.
jpnChrName: ハッ、この程度カザン様にかかれば 何て事は無いな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、この程度カザン様にかかれば
何て事は無いな。

engChrName: ...It feels like there are more monsters around than before.
engSearchText:
...It feels like there are more monsters around
than before.
jpnChrName: だが……潜んでいる魔獣の気配自体は さっきよりも増えているな。
jpnSearchText:
だが……潜んでいる魔獣の気配自体は
さっきよりも増えているな。

engChrName: I'm sure I don't have to spell out what that means.
engSearchText: I'm sure I don't have to spell out what that means.
jpnChrName: この意味は分かるよな？
jpnSearchText: この意味は分かるよな？

engChrName: Nope. It's clear that Gray's not finishing them off, which means he's losing his grip on the situation.
engSearchText:
Nope. It's clear that Gray's not finishing them off,
which means he's losing his grip on the situation.
jpnChrName: グレイが魔獣を討ち漏らしてる、 つまり余裕が無くなってきてるって事か。
jpnSearchText:
グレイが魔獣を討ち漏らしてる、
つまり余裕が無くなってきてるって事か。

engChrName: We'd better hurry before the worst comes to pass.
engSearchText: We'd better hurry before the worst comes to pass.
jpnChrName: その状態で最奥まで行ったとなると…… 急いだ方が良さそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
その状態で最奥まで行ったとなると……
急いだ方が良さそうだな。

engChrName: Wanna take the shortcut through the animal trail?
engSearchText: Wanna take the shortcut through the animal trail?
jpnChrName: ……獣道でも通ってショートカットするか？
jpnSearchText: ……獣道でも通ってショートカットするか？

engChrName: No, we should hold off on that for now.
engSearchText: No, we should hold off on that for now.
jpnChrName: いや……獣道はあるが、 今回はやめた方が良いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
いや……獣道はあるが、
今回はやめた方が良いだろう。

engChrName: I'm sensing more creatures from beyond the thicket.
engSearchText: I'm sensing more creatures from beyond the thicket.
jpnChrName: 藪の向こうから……普段以上に 獣の気配を感じる。
jpnSearchText:
藪の向こうから……普段以上に
獣の気配を感じる。

engChrName: I fear the monsters Gray failed to kill may have gathered together.
engSearchText:
I fear the monsters Gray failed to kill may have
gathered together.
jpnChrName: まあ、グレイから逃れた魔獣が 集まっているってところだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、グレイから逃れた魔獣が
集まっているってところだろうな。

engChrName: They seem pretty on edge, too.
engSearchText: They seem pretty on edge, too.
jpnChrName: 相当気が立ってるヤツも多い。
jpnSearchText: 相当気が立ってるヤツも多い。

engChrName: Hot damn. You've got some keen senses there. In that case, I'll yield to your intuition.
engSearchText:
Hot damn. You've got some keen senses there.
In that case, I'll yield to your intuition.
jpnChrName: ……そんな事まで分かるのか。 なら、その勘に従う他ねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
……そんな事まで分かるのか。
なら、その勘に従う他ねぇが……

engChrName: Hey, mind if I ask you something?
engSearchText: Hey, mind if I ask you something?
jpnChrName: ……さっき合流した時から 薄々察しちゃいたが……
jpnSearchText:
……さっき合流した時から
薄々察しちゃいたが……

engChrName: You're from the East, ain'tcha? I'm thinkin' you must be from one of the northeastern tribes.
engSearchText:
You're from the East, ain'tcha? I'm thinkin' you must
be from one of the northeastern tribes.
jpnChrName: あんた、東方は東方でも…… 北東の方の一族の出だな？
jpnSearchText:
あんた、東方は東方でも……
北東の方の一族の出だな？

engChrName: Wow. Nail on the head. I heard from Drusilla that you had a sharp nose, but I'm still surprised.
engSearchText:
Wow. Nail on the head. I heard from Drusilla that
you had a sharp nose, but I'm still surprised.
jpnChrName: 驚いたな……アンタが鼻が利くってのも ドルシラさんから聞いちゃいたが……
jpnSearchText:
驚いたな……アンタが鼻が利くってのも
ドルシラさんから聞いちゃいたが……

engChrName: The fact that you know about the northeastern tribes is impressive, too. How'd you know I was from there?
engSearchText:
The fact that you know about the northeastern tribes
is impressive, too. How'd you know I was from there?
jpnChrName: いや、この場合は東方の事情に 通じてるのがすげぇのか……
jpnSearchText:
いや、この場合は東方の事情に
通じてるのがすげぇのか……

engChrName: 'Cause the nose knows. Plus seein' those hunting skills of yours helped narrow things down.
engSearchText:
'Cause the nose knows. Plus seein' those hunting
skills of yours helped narrow things down.
jpnChrName: まあ、あんな狩猟スキルを見せられたら 候補はある程度絞られてくんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あんな狩猟スキルを見せられたら
候補はある程度絞られてくんだろ。

engChrName: I hear a decent amount about the East while doin' requests.
engSearchText:
I hear a decent amount about the East while
doin' requests.
jpnChrName: 仕事柄、東の噂もある程度入ってくる。
jpnSearchText: 仕事柄、東の噂もある程度入ってくる。

engChrName: And I know a little of how to differentiate Easterners from everyone else based on quirks of their regions and tribes.
engSearchText:
And I know a little of how to differentiate Easterners
from everyone else based on quirks of their regions
and tribes.
jpnChrName: 東方系でも地域やら部族やらで違いが 色々あることも聞き及んではいるからな。
jpnSearchText:
東方系でも地域やら部族やらで違いが
色々あることも聞き及んではいるからな。

engChrName: Though I can't wrap my head around why someone like you would become a bracer in the Republic.
engSearchText:
Though I can't wrap my head around why someone
like you would become a bracer in the Republic.
jpnChrName: どうしてそんな奴が共和国で 遊撃士なんざやってんのかは知らねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
どうしてそんな奴が共和国で
遊撃士なんざやってんのかは知らねぇが。

engChrName: I don't have some grand reason to share, to be honest. I just got bored of being out in the middle of nowhere.
engSearchText:
I don't have some grand reason to share, to be honest.
I just got bored of being out in the middle
of nowhere.
jpnChrName: ま、特に大それた理由はねぇさ。 あんなド田舎にも飽きた事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、特に大それた理由はねぇさ。
あんなド田舎にも飽きた事だしな。

engChrName: Figured I could make a name for myself in the Republic and enjoy what the capital has to offer. That's all.
engSearchText:
Figured I could make a name for myself in the
Republic and enjoy what the capital has to offer.
That's all.
jpnChrName: 共和国で一旗揚げて都会暮らしを 満喫しようと思って遥々やって来た、それだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
共和国で一旗揚げて都会暮らしを
満喫しようと思って遥々やって来た、それだけだ。

engChrName: I'm sure most of the people in my village have long since forgotten about me.
engSearchText:
I'm sure most of the people in my village have long
since forgotten about me.
jpnChrName: 里のジジイ共も数少ない同年代の奴も、 オレの事なんて忘れてるだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
里のジジイ共も数少ない同年代の奴も、
オレの事なんて忘れてるだろうさ。

engChrName: Eh, don't worry 'bout them. People are free to live however they want. You're no different.
engSearchText:
Eh, don't worry 'bout them. People are free to live
however they want. You're no different.
jpnChrName: そうか、まあ生き方は 自由に選べばいいと思うが……
jpnSearchText:
そうか、まあ生き方は
自由に選べばいいと思うが……

engChrName: Anyway, back to the matter at hand. I smell trouble... I think Gray's nearby.
engSearchText:
Anyway, back to the matter at hand. I smell trouble...
I think Gray's nearby.
jpnChrName: ──それはとにかく、 あんたも気づいているな？
jpnSearchText:
──それはとにかく、
あんたも気づいているな？

engChrName: Yes. He's over by the waterfall—and I sense a monster there as well.
engSearchText:
Yes. He's over by the waterfall—and I sense a
monster there as well.
jpnChrName: ああ、この先に…… まさに瀑布の方にグレイと魔獣の気配だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この先に……
まさに瀑布の方にグレイと魔獣の気配だ。

engChrName: Oh, and it's a big one. We should hurry.
engSearchText: Oh, and it's a big one. We should hurry.
jpnChrName: 魔獣はデカい、急ぐぞ。
jpnSearchText: 魔獣はデカい、急ぐぞ。

engChrName: Roger that.
engSearchText: Roger that.
jpnChrName: ハッ、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、了解だ。

engChrName: Ugh... Can barely move...
engSearchText: Ugh... Can barely move...
jpnChrName: くっ、ヤキが回ったか……
jpnSearchText: くっ、ヤキが回ったか……

engChrName: I-I have to get...stronger...for Sis!
engSearchText: I-I have to get...stronger...for Sis!
jpnChrName: 姉さん……僕は……強く……ッ！
jpnSearchText: 姉さん……僕は……強く……ッ！

engChrName: Gray! Are you all right? Wow, you've hooked a big one this time.
engSearchText:
Gray! Are you all right? Wow, you've hooked a big
one this time.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫かグレイ！　そいつが獲物か？
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫かグレイ！　そいつが獲物か？

engChrName: Kazan?! And you're...
engSearchText: Kazan?! And you're...
jpnChrName: カザン先輩……！？ それに貴方は……
jpnSearchText:
カザン先輩……！？
それに貴方は……

engChrName: We'll chat later. First things first: we gotta take care of this thing. You back down, rookie.
engSearchText:
We'll chat later. First things first: we gotta take care
of this thing. You back down, rookie.
jpnChrName: 話は後だ、こいつを始末する！ ──離脱しろ、ルーキー！
jpnSearchText:
話は後だ、こいつを始末する！
──離脱しろ、ルーキー！

engChrName: Ow. My leg...
engSearchText: Ow. My leg...
jpnChrName: くっ、足が……
jpnSearchText: くっ、足が……

engChrName: Change of plans!
engSearchText: Change of plans!
jpnChrName: ──作戦変更だ！
jpnSearchText: ──作戦変更だ！

engChrName: Kazan, focus on protecting Gray. I'll fry this fishy bastard myself.
engSearchText:
Kazan, focus on protecting Gray. I'll fry this fishy
bastard myself.
jpnChrName: カザン、あんたはグレイのフォローを頼む！ 魔獣は俺一人で何とかする！
jpnSearchText:
カザン、あんたはグレイのフォローを頼む！
魔獣は俺一人で何とかする！

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: ──相分かったぜ！
jpnSearchText: ──相分かったぜ！

engChrName: Oh, damn. This big old fish looks pretty worn down.
engSearchText: Oh, damn. This big old fish looks pretty worn down.
jpnChrName: ハッ、けっこう弱ってんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、けっこう弱ってんじゃねえか。

engChrName: That newbie really did a number on this thing.
engSearchText: That newbie really did a number on this thing.
jpnChrName: この大物相手に 駆け出しが随分食い下がったもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この大物相手に
駆け出しが随分食い下がったもんだ。

engChrName: I'll just finish what he started, then.
engSearchText: I'll just finish what he started, then.
jpnChrName: さあ―― トドメは俺が引き受けさせてもらうぜ！
jpnSearchText:
さあ――
トドメは俺が引き受けさせてもらうぜ！

engChrName: Gah.
engSearchText: Gah.
jpnChrName: くっ……
jpnSearchText: くっ……

engChrName: Sorry. Didn't mean to steal the kill.
engSearchText: Sorry. Didn't mean to steal the kill.
jpnChrName: 余計なお世話だったか？
jpnSearchText: 余計なお世話だったか？

engChrName: Wanted the spotlight for yourself, huh? Still, 'preciate the help.
engSearchText:
Wanted the spotlight for yourself, huh?
Still, 'preciate the help.
jpnChrName: 美味しい所だけ持っていきやがって。 ──まあだが助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
美味しい所だけ持っていきやがって。
──まあだが助かったぜ。

engChrName: Same. Thanks, you two...
engSearchText: Same. Thanks, you two...
jpnChrName: お二人とも……
jpnSearchText: お二人とも……

engChrName: Well, that's a wrap! ...Is what I'd like to say, but I know we need to settle the matter of your pay.
engSearchText:
Well, that's a wrap! ...Is what I'd like to say, but I
know we need to settle the matter of your pay.
jpnChrName: これにて一件落着。 と、言えるかどうかは分からねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
これにて一件落着。
と、言えるかどうかは分からねぇが。

engChrName: You got it. We should go over that with Drusilla.
engSearchText: You got it. We should go over that with Drusilla.
jpnChrName: 積もる話はドルシラさんも交えるべきだろう、 依頼料の件も含めてな。
jpnSearchText:
積もる話はドルシラさんも交えるべきだろう、
依頼料の件も含めてな。

engChrName: Then let's mosey on over to the guild. You okay with that, Gray?
engSearchText:
Then let's mosey on over to the guild. You okay with
that, Gray?
jpnChrName: そんじゃあギルドに戻るとするか。 ──グレイ、それでいいな？
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあギルドに戻るとするか。
──グレイ、それでいいな？

engChrName: Of course.
engSearchText: Of course.
